prod_short_desc: Look after baby animals from all around the world!
prod_long_desc:
These cute creatures from the LEGO® DUPLO® Around the World collection are perfect for little animal lovers to develop early role-play skills. As they care for their new friends, talk to them about what different baby animals are called and where they live in the wild. This set offers great value for learning and play with a tiger cub, giraffe calf, polar bear cub and a turtle hatchling.
Includes a tiger cub, giraffe calf, polar bear cub and a turtle hatchling.
Accessory elements include a flower and spare bricks for added play value.
Little wildlife lovers will have so much fun making up stories with these baby animals.
Encourage role play with an emotional and nurturing theme.
Use LEGO DUPLO Around the World sets to talk to your child about wild animals, their habitats, conservation, different parts of the world and the people and animals who live there—there’sso much to learn!
LEGO DUPLO products are specially designed to be safe and suitable for small hands.
Combine with additional LEGO DUPLO Around the World sets to reunite the babies with their parents.
